# Bloodfreeze Arrow (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], Justice of weald and woe 4, [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One masterwork arrow or bolt

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Champions of Ruin (WotC), pg. 29

This spell is cast upon a masterwork arrow or bolt, transforming its head into blue ice. In addition to taking normal damage from the missile, the target takes 2d6 points of cold damage and is paralyzed. A successful Fortitude save negates the paralysis, and the target can make a new save each round (at the start of the casterâ€™s turn).

*Material Component:* Masterwork arrow or bolt.
